turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Venti Blonde roast coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With a splash of heavy cream, five pumps of sugar-free vanilla, and three shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and three Splenda packs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said venti blonde roast coffee with a splash of heavy cream, 5 pumps of sugar free vanilla, 3 shots of espresso, and 3 splenda packs, is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get that for pick-up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Location in Atwater, California on Shaffer on Bellevue and Shaffer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will send your order to the location on bellvue and schafer, can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you also add a banana nut muffin?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that seems perfectly fine to get everything perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
